description: A third Gun-Swordsman, who works alongside Erin Garnet. Like Erin, he believes Melan is a traitor and is out to kill him. In a flashback, his bayonet sword is revealed to be named Excalibur. He`s more calm about pursuing melan then Erin and doesn`t have passionate rage to kill melan like erin does. He`s the most mature of the guned swordman and the oldest. he used to think of melan as worthy partner and opponent before he took creis after he pyon thought he had shamed the gunned swordsman and should pay for his treachery. When erin was trying to kill melan on brigadoon he ask her to spare him so they could give trail and what his fate would be but she was too clouded by her rage. He along with erin later help melan and marin fight the renegade but killed by the renegade shortly after.His body is then brought to pasca ritural and everyone comes back to life.
name: Pyon Silver
